about_the_game:
An immersive expérience for all

Dive into this chilling story through the meticulously handcrafted environments and bespoke sound design and music. This first person psychological horror experience is a unique and memorable adventure created to be enjoyable for everyone, even if you don’t play a lot of video games or are not a fan of the horror genre.

A strangely familiar terror

Workaholic Simulator: Leaving the Dream explores the darkness of our contemporary world through the most horrible experience everyone has to endure: Work. You will probably find some thematics that you already face everyday if you are a working adult, but the game twists this well known environment to make it a surreal experience. You will never see your work the same way!

Nightmare or Reality?

You can never anticipate what you will find through these hallucinated corridors and hallways. Who knows what lurks behind every corner while you walk through these alienated spaces.
The story of the game is for you to unravel, as no voice and almost no text is used during the game. All the narration is done through the mood, the detail in the environment.
You must prepare for the unthinkable, for only your wit and quick-thinking will let you escape this ethereal world.
